articles.description: The handset has received the update in China. It is worth noting that this device is exclusive to the Chinese market, however, it has been introduced in the global market rebranded as the Poco X2. This suggests the Android 11 update might hit the Poco X2 some…
articles.content: Xiaomi has dished out the stable Android 11 updates to a bunch of its smartphones already. The latest device by the company to receive the new Android OS is the Redmi K30 4G. The company had also rel… [+1940 chars]

articles.title: Redmi K40 is equipped with Snapdragon SM7350 which is faster than SD 765G - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Redmi K40 is equipped with Snapdragon SM7350 which is faster than SD 765G. Chinese sources have found a reference to that in the source code of MIUI 12.
articles.content: Today, Chinese sources have found a reference to an unknown Xiaomi smartphone in the source code of the new version of MIUI 12. This smartphone is equipped with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 series SoC. It… [+3694 chars]
